name: Illuminated Recesses
description:
Welcome to the Glowstream District! This game was created as a weird experimental project, it was my first time making a 3D game but I had a lot of fun making it. If you enjoyed it or have any questions, feel free to message me on here or on Twitter @j_goatcheese.

Game created by Jake Gosche in Unity. 

Base character models from "POLYGON Starter Pack-Low Poly 3D Art by Synty." All other assets made from scratch. 

Enjoy!
